verses.verse: לְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנָשׁ֣וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> and let us return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He טָרָ֖ף <S%H2963><s%> for he hath torn וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑נוּ <S%H7495><s%> and he will heal יַ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> us he hath smitten וְיַחְבְּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H2280><s%> and he will bind us up

יְחַיֵּ֖נוּ <S%H2421><s%> will he revive מִיֹּמָ֑יִם <S%H3117><s%> After two days בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> us in the third יְקִמֵ֖נוּ <S%H6965><s%> he will raise us up וְנִחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> and we shall live לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> in his sight

וְנֵדְעָ֣ה <S%H3045><s%> Then shall we know נִרְדְּפָ֗ה <S%H7291><s%> [if] we follow לָדַ֙עַת֙ <S%H3045><s%> on to know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כְּשַׁ֖חַר <S%H7837><s%> as the morning נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> is prepared מֽוֹצָא֑וֹ <S%H4161><s%> his going forth וְיָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> and he shall come כַגֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1653><s%> unto us as the rain לָ֔נוּ כְּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> as the latter י֥וֹרֶה <S%H3138><s%> autumn rain אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> unto the earth

מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> what shall I do לְּךָ֙ אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> O Ephraim מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> what shall I do לְּךָ֖ יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> unto thee? O Judah וְחַסְדְּכֶם֙ <S%H2617><s%> unto thee? for your goodness כַּֽעֲנַן־ <S%H6051><s%> cloud בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> [is] as a morning וְכַטַּ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> dew מַשְׁכִּ֥ים <S%H7925><s%> and as the early הֹלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> it goeth away

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that חָצַ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H2672><s%> Therefore have I hewed בַּנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> [them] by the prophets הֲרַגְתִּ֖ים <S%H2026><s%> I have slain בְּאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> them by the words פִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth וּמִשְׁפָּטֶ֖יךָ <S%H4941><s%> and thy judgments א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> [are as] the light יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> [that] goeth forth

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> in חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy חָפַ֖צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> For I desired וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> rather זָ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> and not sacrifice וְדַ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> and the knowledge אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God מֵעֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H5930><s%> more than burnt offerings

וְהֵ֕מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like כְּאָדָ֖ם <S%H121><s%> Adam עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> have transgressed בְרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> There בָּ֥גְדוּ <S%H898><s%> there have they dealt treacherously בִֽי׃

גִּלְעָ֕ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead קִרְיַ֖ת <S%H7151><s%> [is] a city פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> of them that work אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity עֲקֻבָּ֖ה <S%H6121><s%> [and is] polluted מִדָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> with blood

וּכְחַכֵּ֨י <S%H2442><s%> of robbers wait אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for a man גְּדוּדִ֗ים <S%H1416><s%> And as troops חֶ֚בֶר <S%H2267><s%> [so] the company כֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of priests דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way יְרַצְּחוּ־ <S%H7523><s%> murder שֶׁ֑כְמָה <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Surely זִמָּ֖ה <S%H2154><s%> lewdness עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> for they commit

בְּבֵית֙ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen [שַׁעֲרִירִיָּה כ] (שַׁעֲרֽוּרִיָּ֑ה <S%H8186><s%> horrible thing ק) שָׁ֚ם <S%H8033><s%> is there זְנ֣וּת <S%H2184><s%> there [is] the whoredom לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim נִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> is defiled יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also יְהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> Also O Judah שָׁ֥ת <S%H7896><s%> he hath set קָצִ֖יר <S%H7105><s%> an harvest לָ֑ךְ בְּשׁוּבִ֖י <S%H7725><s%> for thee when I returned שְׁב֥וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people פ
